observation: Birth Control Maine | Fertility Screening Lewiston | Maine Family Planning  Skip to main menu (207) 922-3222 言語を選択 日本語 アラビア語 翻訳 Quick Exit About Us Leadership Join Our Team Contact Us Blog Patient Resources FAQs Find a Clinic Patient Portal Pay My Bill Patient Voices Our Services Virtual Visits Hub Abortion Services Reproductive Healthcare Primary Care Gender-Affirming Healthcare Family Support Services Reproductive Empowerment Project (REP) For Educators What We Do Teaching Materials Training & Workshops Conference Resources Get Involved Support & Giving Advocacy Policy Information For Media It’s Your Journey, Let Us Guide You. Affordable, Confidential Care No Matter Who You Are Or Where You Live. Donate Book Appointment How can we help? Maine Family Planning provides affordable reproductive health care services for all Mainers, as well as primary care, help for new parents and families, and gender-affirming health services. Some of our services are available online. Birth Control learn more Whether you want to volunteer for Maine Family Planning, donate to our organization, contact your legislators, attend one of our events, or otherwise help to advance reproductive justice, you’re in the right place. Maine Family Planning offers ample opportunities to get involved—and we can only do our work with folks like you. We look forward to hearing from you and standing together for reproductive health care access and rights. Policy Facebook Instagram Twitter Join Our Mailing List Navigating your personal healthcare can be tricky and it’s normal to have a lot of questions. If you can’t find what you’re looking for here, please call What is a Virtual Visit? A Virtual Visit lets you see an expert Maine Family Planning provider without having to travel or leave home. A telehealth appointment is a lot like your regular in-person visit, just over video. All you need is Internet access and a smartphone, tablet, or computer with a camera. learn more here Do you have Plan B or Emergency Contraception? There are three ways to access emergency contraception in Maine. Are your services confidential? All of our services are confidential. More FAQs here Our Blog ICYMI: “It’s More Important Than Ever” That Maine Funds Family Planning Services March 26, 2024 Uncategorized Family Planning Advocates Held Day of Action to Call on Legislature to Fund Bill Investing in Maine’s Family Planning Network Augusta, Maine –– On Thursday, dozens of advocates from across the state gathered at the State House urging lawmakers to fund LD 1478, “An Act to Improve Women’s Health and Economic Security by Funding Family […] Click Here to Read More Statement on AFHM v FDA from Maine Family Planning President & CEO George A. Hill Abortion The case being heard before the Supreme Court this week has nothing to do with patient safety, as the anti-abortion groups that brought the lawsuit claim. Decades of research show that mifepristone is safe or safer than any other commonly used drugs, including penicillin and acetaminophen. It’s clear this attack is political in nature and […] Click to Read All blog posts | For Staff 207.922.3222 Back to Top 原文 この翻訳を評価してください いただいたフィードバックは Google 翻訳の改善に役立てさせていただきます
